subject: Western Union Money Transfer
body:
Western Union Money Transfer.
Address: no. 5 Western Avenue Cotonou,.
West Africa, republic Du' Benin
Attn please,
This is to notify you about the latest development concerning all your
payments that are left in our custody which your were supposed to
receive earlier last year 2022. Besides, you were given a bill of $250
in order to receive your payments of which we didn’t hear from you for
some time now....
Hence, our western union is now offering a special bonus to help all
our customers that are having their payments in our custody due to of
prices in other words; we are now requesting that you should only pay
the sum of $50 only to receive your payments.
Besides, my dear these are the opportunity for you to comply and your
funds shall be transferred to your designated address.
But remember that after (3 days) you did not make the payment then we
will retrieve your transfers, so try to avoid this problem because
this year is not like last year.
Again after (three days) we will enter a new project for the year and
that is the reason why we decided to help you before we enter into the
new project.
So we advise you to send only $50 today so that we will register and
update your payments for you to start receiving your $6,000 daily as
from today. Be advice that there is no time again for we to call an
person on phone unless you will call. Phone: + 229 98270349 After the
payment of $50 you will start receiving your money every day
$6,000 through western union until your total amount of funds $920.000
is fully paid to you. Below is the mtcn numbers which you will use to
pick up the first $6,000 it will be updated in few hours' time once we
receive the fee from you.
MTCN: 9832228629
Sender:Holly Waldon
Question: Best Color
Answer: Yellow
Amount: $6,000
Don’t expose this numbers to anybody else. You should send the $50
through western union money transfer with the written information
below and email me back with the payment information once you do that.
SEND THE REQUIRED FEE TO THIS INFO:
RECEIVER:Holly Waldon
COUNTRY: BENIN REPUBLIC
CITY COTONOU
QUESTION: TODAY?
ANSWER: YES
The moment you do that, write out the payment information written on
the payment slip, forward it back to us which will enable in
confirming the payment you sent such as,
MTCN#
SENDER'S NAME
SENDER'S ADDRESS
AMOUNT:
Note; this is the only payment you are required to make in this regard
for every other fee has been waived by the Federal Ministry.
As soon as we confirm the fee today, we will immediately activate your
mtcn# and notify you then you go and pick up your $6,000 today as
stated. Please note that you need to go along with your passport ID or
Driver's license when you need to pick up the transfer today okay.
Waiting on your urgent respond.
Sincerely,
Holly Waldon
Western Union Cotonou-Benin Republic
Tel: (+229) 98270349

subject: Re:   Western Union Money Transfer
body:
Hello Holly Waldon,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your efforts in trying to help me with my payments. However, I have a few questions that I would like to clarify before proceeding further.

Firstly, could you please explain why there was a delay in receiving my payments last year? Also, could you provide more details about the special bonus that Western Union is offering?

Secondly, you mentioned that I need to pay a certain amount to receive my payments. Could you please elaborate on what this payment is for and how it will benefit me?

Lastly, you mentioned about a new project that Western Union will be entering into after three days. Could you provide more information about this project and how it might affect my payments?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: FROM WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER
body:
Attn.Dear.Costumer.

We have received your email and your response is well noted in this office
today. Your first payment is already sent to you but the only thing holding
your first payment now is the Tax clearance certificate and once we obtain
the tax clearance certificate you will start receiving your daily payment
of $6000 until the total $920.000 usd is complete transfer on your name.

All we need is a Tax clearance certificate and the certificate can be
obtained on your name, so it will cost you $50 usd.and advised to send the
$50usd to enable us obtain the Tax clearance certificate from Foreign
payment coordination for releasing the payment to you, as soon as we
receive the fee of $50 today your first payment will follow it immediately
without any delaying

Go to the MoneyGram or Western union or   RIA money transfer and send the
money together with correct address avoid wrong transfer

Send it to MoneyGram or Western Union,

RECEIVER: STEVE ADAM
COUNTRY: BENIN REPUBLIC
CITY COTONOU
QUESTION: TODAY?
ANSWER: YES

You are advised to send the fee as soon as possible to enable us to
complete the transferring of the payment to you without delay. Be informed
that this is all you need to pay. Note that you shall be receiving the
funds in the rate of $6000until the total funds of 920.000 usd is
completely transferred to you.


Sincerely,
Holly Waldon
Western Union Cotonou-Benin Republic

subject: Re: FROM WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER
body:
Hello Holly Waldon,

Thank you for your email. I'm really excited about this opportunity and I appreciate your efforts in making the payment process smooth.

I understand that a Tax clearance is required to proceed with the payment. However, I'm not very familiar with this process. Could you please explain more about what a Tax clearance is and why it's necessary? 

Also, could you provide more details on how to send the money through Western Union or RIA money transfer? I've never used these services before so any guidance would be greatly appreciated.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: FROM WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER
body:
Attn.Dear.Costumer.

I don't understand why you are asking so many questions? Go to apple shop
and buy iTunes card or any Gift card like google card

Sincerely,
Holly Waldon
Western Union Cotonou-Benin Republic

subject: Re: FROM WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER
body:
Hi Holly,

Thanks for your response! I'm just trying to understand the process better. So, you're suggesting that I should go to an Apple shop and buy a gift card? Could you please explain how this works? And why specifically an Apple or Google gift card?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Robert

subject: Re: FROM WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER
body:
Hello Holly Waldon,

Thank you for your email. I'm really excited about the prospect of receiving my first payment. However, I have a few questions that I hope you can help me with.

Firstly, could you please explain to me what exactly this Tax clearance is? And why is it necessary for me to pay for it?

Secondly, could you provide more details about how the daily payments will be made? Will they be sent directly to my bank account or do I need to collect them from somewhere?

Lastly, you mentioned that the total amount of USD will be transferred in my name. Could you clarify what this total amount is?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: FROM WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER
body:
Attn.Dear.Costumer.
I don't talk too much that is why i told you what you will do to receive
your first payment of $6000,

Note your fund is with us in Western union Benin Republic nothing will
happen with your fund,

Find where to send the $50 to obtain the tax clearance certificate so that
you will start pick your money from any western union in your country, Look
for Gift card and send it now by next 3 hours i will send you New MTCN
number  to pick your payment, Send your address and your phone number

Sincerely,
Holly Waldon
Western Union Cotonou-Benin Republic

subject: Re: FROM WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER
body:
Hello Holly Waldon,

Thank you for your message. It's great to hear that there's a payment waiting for me in Western Union Benin Republic. I'm not very familiar with the process, could you please explain it to me in more detail? 

You mentioned something about a tax clearance and a gift card. How does that work exactly? And how will sending a gift card help me receive my payment?

Also, you asked for my address and phone number. Could we perhaps proceed without sharing this information? I'm just trying to be cautious.
